sentences.en: It's better that the housemaster guides the children when they are watching TV.
sentences.cn: 孩子看电视时最好有家长在旁边指导.

sentences.en: The housemaster fixed Jack with a decidedly hostile look.
sentences.cn: 房东恶狠狠地瞪着杰克.

trans.tran_en: a male teacher who is in charge of one of the houses (= groups of children of different ages ) in a school
